title: Domain Collection Started Event Schema
description: Schema for the DomainCollectionStarted event published when an interactive domain collection session begins

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the collection session started

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the domain collection agent

session_id.description: Unique identifier for this collection session

environment.description: CIM environment where the collection is taking place

version.description: Version of the domain collection agent

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the collection session
